string.original: Encapsulates exceptions which occur processing WSDL
string.translation: Encapsulates exceptions which occur processing WSDL

string.original: Errors processing the WSDL file will result in {docref WSDLSyntaxException}s. || TODO: describe errors and warnings
string.translation: Errors processing the WSDL file will result in {docref WSDLSyntaxException}s.

string.original:
Generate curl source code for Web Service described by a WSDL file.
{parameter source, the {ctext Url} of the WSDL file.} {parameter target, the {ctext Url} of the output. Defaults to source filename with extension {monospace .scurl}, in source directory if its local, otherwise applet directory.} {parameter package-prefix, If specified, generated code will include package herald, with package-name derived by appending WSDL basename to the prefix. The default is {monospace "COM.CURL.WSDL."}} {parameter package-suffix, If specified, the final part of the package name. The default is based on the service name in the WSDL file.} {parameter curl-versions, If specified, indicates curl versions mentioned in generated package herald. The default is the versions supported by this package.}

translation.p: Generate curl source code for Web Service described by a WSDL file.

p.curl: source,the {ctext Url} of the WSDL file.
target,the {ctext Url} of the output. Defaults to source filename with extension .scurl, in source directory if its local, otherwise applet directory.
package-prefix,If specified, generated code will include package herald, with package-name derived by appending WSDL basename to the prefix. The default is "COM.CURL.WSDL."
package-suffix,If specified, the final part of the package name. The default is based on the service name in the WSDL file.
curl-versions,If specified, indicates curl versions mentioned in generated package herald. The default is the versions supported by this package.

string.original: The classes in this package assist developers in making SOAP requests over HTTP based on a WSDL file.
string.translation: The classes in this package assist developers in making SOAP requests over HTTP based on a WSDL file.

string.original: The {ctext Url} of the generated file.
string.translation: The {ctext Url} of the generated file.
